run id.short_description: somatic variants: vcf file of somatic variants
somatic variants: maf file of somatic variants
run id.long_description: MAF file of VEP annotated variants

run id.short_description: somatic variants: vcf file of filtered somatic variants
run id.long_description: VCF file of filtered somatic variants

run id.short_description: somatic variants: maf file of filtered somatic variants
run id.long_description: MAF file of filtered variants annotated by VEP

run id.short_description: somatic variants: vcf file of filtered somatic variants from center target regions
run id.long_description: VCF file of filtered somatic variants from center target regions

run id.short_description: somatic variants: overlap of somatic and germline variants
run id.long_description: VCFtools is used to compare somatic and germline variants.  The file shows the number of common variants, somatic only, and germline only variants.

run id.short_description: somatic variants: report file of tumor mutational burden in tumor and normal
run id.long_description: This file derived from the VCFtools somatic and germline variants comparison result and is displayed in a readable manner.  The file reports the number of somatic/tumor only variants, germline/normal only variants, the number of shared variants, and the percent overlap (using the total number of somatic variants as the denominator).

run id.short_description: hla: report file of combined MHC class I and II results
run id.long_description: This file reports the MHC class I and II results.  The class I alleles are derived from the OptiType results and the class II alleles come from the xHLA results.
The combined MHC class I and II prediected neoantigens using the pVACseq software.  The column definitions are given here (ref: https://pvactools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/pvacseq/output_files.html)

run id.short_description: tumor purity: tumor purity analysis results
run id.long_description: Tumor purity calculations using the FACETS software.

run id.short_description: tumor clonality: tumor clonality analysis results
run id.long_description: Tumor clonality results using PyClone software.
Copy number variation analysis results using Sentieon CNV algorithm
Segmented copy number variation file using Sentieon CNV algorithm

run id.short_description: wes report: wes summary html report
